laundry.translation[0].definitions[0].de: clothes, sheets etc that need to be washed or have just been washed
laundry.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She did the laundry  (=washed the clothes etc) and hung it out to dry.
laundry.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a place or business where clothes etc are washed and ironed
laundry.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: I cleaned the kitchen and did some laundry.
He was folding the laundry and watching TV.
My mother was hanging out the laundry in the sun.
a pile of laundry waiting to be put away
I do at least one or two loads of laundry every day.
There's a washing machine in the laundry room.
Pete put his dirty clothes in the laundry basket.
laundry.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a financial organization, such as a bank, used as a place to put money obtained from illegal activities
